life. Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind him as Reid. "He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field," Reid said. Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.

time. The current version of this OS has drawn criticism for its lack of multitasking. Joe Fiore, the head of the Windows Phone 7 team, joined Steve Ballmer on stage at the MWC and said, When apps run in the background, you risk draining your battery. Our implementation provides a battery-safe solution for third-party multitasking. In a demo, Fiore showed how this will work: pressing and holding on the smartphone's Back button will bring up a list of currently running software. More Changes Are Coming Fiore
